column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Great place for good tapas! I've been here many times and always loved coming back. Some of my favorites include patatas bravas
column4: fried calamari. I really loved their paella too. Also
column5: you must try their pinxtos - which are nothing but really small snacks. Their bacon wrapped dates
column7: croquettes and crostini - all were delicious.
